Exorcist horror movie ads so terrifying Universal Pictures has removed them https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/exorcist-horror-movie-ads-so-terrifying-universal-pictures-has-removed-them/VTIFU4TW75B37BFMWK3MJF4E7E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/exorcist-horror-movie-ads-so-terrifying-universal-pictures-has-removed-them/VTIFU4TW75B37BFMWK3MJF4E7E/ Tracy NealThe advertisement showed a close-up of two girls with demonic eyes and bloody mouths. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 06:00:00 +0000 The Advertising Standards Authority has fielded a volley of complaints about "terrifying advertisements" for a horror film that featured “possessed teens” and religious symbolism. Photo / 123RF
Driver licence test delays frustrate Auckland motorists, NZTA disputes wait times https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/driver-licence-test-delays-frustrate-auckland-motorists-nzta-disputes-wait-times/ZDUN6ANMWNAGFNR5427RBO2NEA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/driver-licence-test-delays-frustrate-auckland-motorists-nzta-disputes-wait-times/ZDUN6ANMWNAGFNR5427RBO2NEA/ Rachel MaherParents say booking system shows year-long wait but NZTA disputes claims. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 06:00:00 +0000 Motorists claim they face waiting up to a year to sit restricted and full licence tests.
Queenstown cryptosporidium: Council lifts boil water notice https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queenstown-cryptosporidium-council-lifts-boil-water-notice/YRGLLG4Y4FDQHKIQKTLGKB7TXQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queenstown-cryptosporidium-council-lifts-boil-water-notice/YRGLLG4Y4FDQHKIQKTLGKB7TXQ/ Residents can go back to using water straight from tap after cryptosporidium outbreak. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 05:43:35 +0000 A boil water notice had been in place for parts of Queenstown Lakes District Council since mid-September. Photo / 123rf
Central Soldiers pack rape convict Inoke Tangitau in court on gun charge 25 years later https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/central-soldiers-pack-rape-convict-inoke-tangitau-in-court-on-gun-charge-25-years-later/LZPJI2TKBZE3TIU2MMJHOLL7KI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/central-soldiers-pack-rape-convict-inoke-tangitau-in-court-on-gun-charge-25-years-later/LZPJI2TKBZE3TIU2MMJHOLL7KI/ Craig KapitanHe went on to become a high-ranking Rebels gang member but says he wants a fresh start. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 05:36:34 +0000 Inoke Tangitau was a member of the Central Soldiers street gang during Auckland's infamous "Lovers Lane" attacks but he went on to become sergeant-at-arms for the Rebels motorcycle gang. He now says he wants to put gang life behind him.
